interestingcomments.content:
Does anyone keep the sidecar files in the video folder? /!/ When I import files, I go old school and navigate to the Clips folder on my memory card using the Mac Finder, and manually copy/paste the MP4 files to my NAS.

I send the sidecar files to the trash bin.  Any reason to keep?

FWIW, I have an A7iii and use DaVinci for editing.
